DXPR Builder Elements

Drupal blocks and views displays are available as elements:

The positioned layers element is our freehand tool.

It allows for freehand positioning of any element you put inside. In this example, the layers are icon elements, that could be used to link to different pages. Most sites will not need an advanced layout tool like this, but it's good to know it's there when you needed it.
